#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int x;
    char a[1000]="\0";
    cin>>x;
    if(x==0)
        cout<<1<<"\n";
    else if(x==1)
        cout<<0<<"\n";
    else
    {
        int c=0;
        int i=0;
        if(x%2==1)
            {a[i++]='4';
            c++;
            }
        for(;c<=(x-2);)
            {a[i++]='8';
            c+=2;}
        a[i]='\0';
        cout<<a<<"\n";
    }
}
